body:
Hi everyone,

      Today we have rolled out an update to profiles which improves the layout and adds some more information. This update re-adds the graphs from the old MCZone profiles and adds some more statistics in regards to XP. 
       With this change, we are happy to announce that the about section's dimensions have not changed. This means that legacy about pages will work with the new layout!

Here's a picture of the new page. Be sure to check it out on your own profile!



ALM

Response Approved by the H̵̨̞̫̹̺̳̪̭̠͋̓̈́́̉͢͠i̷̦̜̰̟̤͙̭͋̇͂̾͐̀͜͞͠ͅǧ̡̫̟̥̤̲̮̫̩̋̋̓̋̓͠͝͠h̸̡͇̰͙͉̞̙͓̯̓͆̊͐̽́̚ A̵̧̛͚̻͙͍̰̻̜̝̔͛̉̉̐ͅş̺͙̦̤͇̲̰͑̂̄̀̋̏̑͒͜͜͡͡c̷͇̭͓̜̼̾͌̆̎͗̓̋͝ͅę̵̳̞͔̞̻͈͇̆̅̅͋͆͒̃̽̓̏͟ͅn̸͚̻͍̝̜̒͛̊̂̌̓̿̄͟͞d̪͎̩̫̤̬̂̐͒͑͒ả̬̩͎̗̖̬̰̙̀̔̐̈͟͝ͅn̡̮̱̟̩̼̎̂̀̀͋͐͘͠ţ̷͙̲͖̼͖͇͕̈͋̍̅͒͢͞͝ͅ
